query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.stats.connections`) as 'Connections' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: SQL compilations and re-compilations
props.hint: The number of MS SQL compilations and re-compilations per second.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`stats.sqlCompilations`) as `Compilations`, average(`mssql.instance.stats.sqlRecompilationsPerSecond`) as `Re-compilations` FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Buffer cache hit percentage
props.hint: The percentage of buffer pools hits on the instance.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.system.bufferPoolHitPercent`) as 'Cache hit' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Average batch requests
props.hint: The number of batch requests per second on the buffer pool.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.bufferpool.batchRequestsPerSecond`) as 'Batch requests' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Page life expectancy
props.hint: The life expectancy of a page in the buffer pool, in milliseconds.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.bufferpool.pageLifeExpectancyInMilliseconds`) as 'Page life expentancy' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Number of blocked processes
props.hint: The number of blocked processes on the instance.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.instance.blockedProcessesCount`) as 'Blocked processes' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Lock waits
props.hint: The number of times per second that MS SQL Server is unable to retain a lock right away for a resource.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.stats.lockWaitsPerSecond`) as 'Times' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Total wait time
props.hint: The number of milliseconds per second spent waiting across the instance.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.system.waitTimeInMillisecondsPerSecond`) as 'Wait time' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Page splits
props.hint: The number of page splits per second.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.access.pageSplitsPerSecond`) as 'Page splits' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Checkpoint pages
props.hint: The number of pages flushed to disk per second by a checkpoint or other operation that require all dirty pages to be flushed.

query.nrql: SELECT average(`mssql.instance.buffer.checkpointPagesPerSecond`) as 'Checkpoint pages' FROM Metric WHERE `entity.guid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
